name: Free Rider HD
description:
The hit web game comes to iOS! Originally a Flash game released in 2007, and then HTML5, Free Rider has an active community and over 300,000 player created tracks

  • Endless gameplay, don't like a track? Skip it and ride on.
  • Choose either a BMX or Mountain Bike.
  • Realistic Stickman Physics™
  • Power-ups including Gravity, Boost, Slow Time, Helicopter and more!
  • Insane stunts and gnarly bails.
  • Customize your rider with unlockable helmets.

We welcome your feedback! Free Rider is a community driven and dynamic game, and your feedback will help us improve.
